name: Bubble Recycle
description:
Game created in 60 hours for the GameJam Pot-au-Jeu organized by At0mium.

Name of the game : Bubble Recycle

Description : This game is full bugged. D:

This is a game about recycling (old) items to get new ones. The idea is to progress in a dungeon under water (make your way to the abyss). You don't need to kill every monster to progress but it can helps you going faster.

Team (4 members):

Joel 'GCake' Huang(Developper),
Mathieu 'Kynokaze' Rakoto(Developper),
Axel De Nardi(Graphist),
Chloé Horellou(Graphist)

Control :

ZQSD to move.
Arrow keys to shoot.
A to open/close inventory.
E to interact.

What is missing :

- Every Sprites animation... :sob: (;__;)
- Feedback from shoot/damage/etc.
- Using object that we took in our inventory.
- Some more sprites (that has been done by graphists but not implemented... sorry guys ;__;)

Known Bugs :

- Some dead monsters will still inflict you damage if you touch them.
- If you go through a gate and pass back really fast, the camera will maybe not be able to follow and will stay at the previous room instead of the current room you are in.
- The inventory will sometime not show the items you have.
- The inventory Recycle feature isn't working in the version we put here ;__; (it did works in a previous version though...)
- Ennemies in other room will sometime get stuck on wall when you arrived or even waiting you in front of the door ! D:
- When you die and restart, you will not respawn at the beginning but, instead, you will continue at where you died and with full life (this is op, lol)

Overall ?

Well, although all of these bugs and missing features, it was still a nice experience and we learnt a lot of things. Thank you At0mium for organizing this GameJam :)
(Merci !)
